actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to establish a reduced rate of postage for letters sealed against inspection mailed by private individuals.
short_title: Private Individuals' Postal Rate Relief Act

summary.text: Private Individuals' Postal Rate Relief Act - States that the rate of postage for letters of private individuals within any class of mail for transmission of letters sealed against inspection shall not exceed 10 cents per ounce per letter. Excludes any letter mailed by a corporation, company, business association, proprietorship, professional entity, partnership institution, organization or governmental unit from such provision. Provides a civil fine of $2,500 for each use of the private individuals' reduced rate without authorization.

titles.title: Private Individuals' Postal Rate Relief Act
A bill to establish a reduced rate of postage for letters sealed against inspection mailed by private individuals.
